Euroleague Basketball Teams Data

euroleague_basketball.Rd

Cleaned information on Euroleague teams: home cities, arenas, capacities, and historical performance (Final Four appearances and titles).

Usage

euroleague_basketball

Format

A data.table with 20 rows and 12 variables:

Team

Character. Team name.

Home city

Character. Home city.

Arena

Character. Arena(s) used.

Capacity

Character. Stated capacity (may contain multiple values).

Last season

Character. Last EuroLeague season finish.

Country

Character. Country.

FinalFour_Appearances

Character. Number of Final Four appearances.

Titles_Won

Character. Number of EuroLeague titles.

Years_of_FinalFour_Appearances

Character. Years of Final Four appearances (comma-separated).

Years_of_Titles_Won

Character. Years of titles (comma-separated).

Source

Wikipedia: EuroLeague page; merged with your curated finals file. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/EuroLeague and your package's data-raw/ scripts.
